BIO

I'm Mohammad Hussain a passionate front-end developer with over 5 years of web development experience. Building responsive, accessible and cross browser compatible websites and applications.

I specialise in HTML, CSS and JavaScript and have experience working with content management systems such as Wordpress, Episerver and Sitecore for some of the UK's largest clients: Bank of England, Metropolitan Police and Jet2Holidays.
